name: Slippy Santa
description:
Slippy Santa is BrainyBeards Christmas game 2015!

Play as Santa, as he takes a tumble off of a roof, and starts snowballing across the Earth! Will you save him!?

The game was made in 48 hours as part of Ludum Dare 34 using the themes 'Two Button Controls' and 'Growing'. If you've recorded a let's play then be sure to say Hi and link to us on Twitter! We'd love to check it out :)

Note: All graphics are made by us, other than the UI and music.
